    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        public static void initialise(Context context,
                              java.lang.String appVappId,
                              java.util.List<VappProduct> products,
                              VappNumberRange destinationNumberRange,
                              boolean testMode,
                              boolean cancellableProducts)
                       throws InvalidSmsCountException,
                              InvalidApplicationVappIdException,
                              InvalidProductIdException,
                              InvalidVappNetworkException,
                              InvalidVappProductException,
                              InvalidVappNumberException
        This should be called in onCreate() to initialise the Vapp SDK with the application Vapp Id, a list of products available to the user & the range of destination numbers allocated by Vasilitate for this App.

        If this method is not called, the behaviour of other methods is undetermined.

        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        appVappId - the unique application Id (1 - 15 alpha-numeric characters (no spaces))
        products - a list of VappProduct objects, representing the available products
        destinationNumberRange - range of destination numbers allocated by Vasilitate your App.
        testMode - false for default functionality, true to disable SMS sending for test purposes
        cancellableProducts - true if users should be able to cancel product purchases (default), false if not
        Throws:
        InvalidApplicationVappIdException - invalid application Vapp Id.
        InvalidProductIdException - invalid Product Id.
        InvalidVappNetworkException - invalid Vapp Network.
        InvalidVappProductException - invalid Vapp product.
        InvalidSmsCountException - invalid SMS Count given for a product.
        InvalidVappNumberException - invalid Vapp number specified.

      • isRoaming

        public static boolean isRoaming(Context context)
                         throws VappException
        Checks if the device is currently roaming.
        Returns:
        true if a roaming network is currently being used, otherwise false
        Throws:
        VappException - Vapp exception - see its message for details.

      • isSIMPresent

        public static boolean isSIMPresent(Context context)
                            throws VappException
        Checks if the device currently has a SIM
        Returns:
        true if the device currently has a valid SIM, or false if does not.
        Throws:
        VappException - Vapp exception - see its message for details.

      • isOriginatingNetworkSupported

        public static boolean isOriginatingNetworkSupported(Context context)
                                             throws VappException
        Checks if the Originating Network for the current device is declared within the network list used to initialise VAPP!
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        Returns:
        true if the current device's network is supported.
        Throws:
        VappException - Vapp exception - see its message for details.

      • getSMSPaymentProgress

        public static int getSMSPaymentProgress(Context context,
                                        VappProduct product)
                                 throws VappException
        Gets the number of SMS messages that have already been sent for an incomplete payment.
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        product - the product
        Returns:
        the number of SMS messages sent.
        Throws:
        VappException - Vapp exception - see its message for details.

      • setSMSPaymentProgress

        public static void setSMSPaymentProgress(Context context,
                                         VappProduct product,
                                         int progress)
                                  throws VappException
        Sets the number of SMS messages that have been sent for an incomplete payment. This should be used to restore backed up data in any scenario where the user clears application data.
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        product - the given product
        progress - the number of sent messages
        Throws:
        VappException - Vapp exception - see its message for details.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if a payment is in progress.

                                           VappProduct product,
                                           int redeemedCount)
                                    throws VappException

        Parameters:

        product - the product
        redeemedCount - new count
        Throws:
        VappException - Vapp exception - see its message for details.

      • getProductBeingPurchased

        public static VappProduct getProductBeingPurchased(Context context)
                                            throws VappException
        Returns any product which is currently being purchases. This function must be called at started to allow for the resumption of any interrupted purchase.
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        Returns:
        the product being purchased (null if none are).
        Throws:
        VappException - Vapp exception - see its message for details.

      • showVappPaymentScreen

        public static boolean showVappPaymentScreen(Context context,
                                            VappProduct product,
                                            boolean modal)
                                     throws VappException
        Displays the Vapp Payment screen
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        product - the product to initial a new purchase with.
        modal - if true the payment but complete before the user can exit the screen.
        Returns:
        true if the screen was displayed.
        Throws:
        VappException - Vapp exception - see its message for details.

      • cancelVappPayment

        public static void cancelVappPayment(Context context)
                              throws VappException
        Cancels a payment that is currently in progress for a product. This will stop any further SMSs from being sent & retain the number of SMS already sent (if any). Initialise must have been called with the cancellable products parameter set to true.
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        Throws:
        VappException - Vapp exception - see its message for details.
